settings.text: Contact us! We aim to reply to all enquiries within 24 hours.

Email: info@mudjeans.eu 

Call us: +31 (0) 35 203 1786

Visit us: Amersfoortsestraatweg 117, 1251 AV Laren, The Netherlands (MUD Headquarters)

settings.title: Marketing & Partnerships inquiries
settings.answer:
For press & marketing opportunities, please send an e-mail to, our marketing team at marketing@mudjeans.eu.

For brand partnership opportunities, please send an e-mail to Ayush at ayush@mudjeans.eu.

We look forward to hearing from you!

settings.title: Sales inquiries
settings.answer: Are you interested in selling MUD Jeans in your store? If you are enthusiastic about the MUD brand and all it stands for, send us an e-mail to orders@mudjeans.eu. We are looking forward to hearing from you!

settings.title: Questions about your order?
settings.answer:
Have a different questions?

Head on over to our FAQ page. Here, more information is provided on different topics. You will hopefully find your answer there! As always, in case you still have questions, feel free to reach out to us!

settings.title: Job opportunities
settings.answer:
Job openings

We are currently looking to strengthen our Sales Back Office Team. Please see this link for details or email to  jobs@mudjeans.eu with your C.V. and introduction letter.

Internships

We are always looking for enthusiastic interns to strengthen the team. Are you interested in working at MUD Jeans and gaining valuable work experience? Send an e-mail to jobs@mudjeans.eu.

settings.title: Sustainability inquiries
settings.answer:
Interested in a collaboration? Please send an e-mail to Adele at adele@mudjeans.eu. We are looking forward to hearing from you!

For thesis interview inquiries, please send an email to info@mudjeans.eu to find out more about our monthly Q&As.

settings.title: Can I do my internship at MUD Jeans?
settings.answer: We are always looking for enthusiastic interns to strengthen the team. Are you interested in working at MUD Jeans and gaining valuable work experience? Send an e-mail to danique@mudjeans.eu.

settings.title: Can I do my interview with you for my thesis?
settings.answer: How nice that you are interested in sustainable fashion & MUD Jeans. We wish we could reply to everyone individually, however, we receive a lot of requests and have therefore set up a monthly webinar with our Founder Bert van Son and our CSR Officer Lea Eckstein. They can answer all the questions you have, and you can also learn from the other participants. These webinars take place on the first Monday of every month at 3pm CEST. You can sign up here. You will receive a zoom link & more information via email once you are signed up.

settings.title: Ambassador Program
settings.answer: We would love for you to join the MUD network and become an ambassador of the brand. Please sign up for the ambassador program here, a place for creators and change makers to get rewarded for supporting MUD’s circular mission.

settings.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
settings.subheading: Promotions, new products and sales. Directly to your inbox.
